column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Amelinda - Thank your for your review. I regret that you disagreed with the amount of food included in our kid's meals. As a franchise concept
column2: we don't get to decide our recipes
column3: but we respect your opinion nonetheless. We rarely
column5: receive feedback that our food lacks flavor
column6: but if you are ever dissatisfied in any way
column7: please inform your server and we will either replace the item or remove it from your tab.
